Package org.apache.juneau.rest.logger

Class CallLoggerRule

java.lang.Object
org.apache.juneau.rest.logger.CallLoggerRule
public class CallLoggerRule
extends java.lang.Object
Represents a logging rule used by CallLogger.
  • Logging / Debugging
